shortdesc.ph: Sets the mixed audio format for the "onMixedAudioFrame" callback.

section.p: This method sets the format of the callback data.

ul.li: Ensure that you call this method before joining a channel.

And, Sample interval (sec) = `samplePerCall`/(`sampleRate` × `channel`).And, Sample interval (sec) = `samplePerCall`/(`sampleRate` × `channel`).. Ensure that the sample interval ≥ 0.01 (s). The SDK will trigger a callback according to the sampling interval.

plentry.pd: Supported file sample rates: 8000, 16000, 32000, 44100, and 48000 Hz.
The number of sampling points of the data returned in the RTMP/RTMPS streaming application is usually 1024.
